function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Complex conservation outcomes of non-covid-19 perturbations","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on author expertise may introduce bias in case study selection","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unverified anticipated outcomes may lead to inaccurate conclusions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited representation of conservation settings and cultures in case study selection","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The focus on perturbations with major social, political, economic, and/or ecological impacts may include contagious diseases like covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased hunting and harvesting pressure on domestic animals and wildlife due to covid-related societal changes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Postponement or cancellation of research, monitoring, and training/education programs in the conservation sector due to global reduction in mobility","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declines in travel and tourism revenue affecting conservation funding","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Novel zoonotic disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Premature death of conservationists due to covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental, economic, and societal changes","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases, such as covid-19, impacting global society","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglect of major conservation issues during the pandemic","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in conservation funding and government commitments due to economic downturn","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Declines in conservation revenue and capacity, livelihood and trade disruptions","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerabilities in social and economic models supporting conservation efforts","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited empirical work on covid-19 and entrepreneurship","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain government policy measures","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New variant of covid-19 driving increased transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing measures in virtual programs for smes","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of financial support for entrepreneurship programs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate government interventions for risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Supply chain vulnerability due to reliance on suppliers from countries with more covid-19 cases","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Air and ocean freight crunch due to lack of flights and container imbalance","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Behavioral changes due to the covid-19 crisis affecting entrepreneurship","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of supportive infrastructure for entrepreneurship universities, science parks, incubators","category":"Infrastructure resources and financial constraints create challenges in implementing resilient practices within smes, especially during a crisis.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Resilience risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation of socio-economic systems for future shocks","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges posed by the health
